about.title: My Journey
about.subtitle: Obsessive builder by day, bon vivant by night
about.journeyText: Full-stack software engineer at PhoneGS in Jerusalem. Passionate about building powerful, efficient products. Between lines of code, I enjoy family time and good pizzas on Jerusalem rooftops.
about.philosophyText: I'm passionate about AI and automation. My goal: build tools that make people's lives easier while having fun doing it. Every project is an opportunity to learn and push the limits.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my web development achievements, from personal experimentation to professional projects.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I master in full-stack web development, from design to production.
skills.alwaysLearning: Always learning, always curious about new technologies

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out for any opportunity, project, or just to chat.
contact.willReply: I'll get back to you soon.
